sourcesContent:
<script>
  import {Line} from 'vue-chartjs'

  export default {
    name:'sample',
    extends: Line,
    props: ['date', 'challenge'],
    data () {
      return {
        dates:[],
        values:[],
        dat:'',
        data:[],
        datacollection: {
          datasets: [
            {  
            data:this.data,
            label: 'Chart from API ',
            borderColor: '#7367F0'
            }
            // {
            //   label: 'Data One',
            //   pointBackgroundColor: '#F25207',
            //   borderWidth: 5,
            //   fill:false,
            //   pointBorderColor: '#F25207',
            //   data: [60, 40, 20, 50, 90, 10, 20, 40, 50, 70, 90, 100]
            // },
            // {
            //   label: 'Data Two',
            //   pointBackgroundColor: 'white',
            //   borderWidth: 1,
            //   opacity:0.5,
            //   backgroundColor:"#F2D707",
            //   pointBorderColor: '#249EBF',
            //   data: [20, 60, 10, 80, 30, 50, 60, 20, 30, 40, 70, 20]
            // }
          ]
        },
        options: {
          scales: {
            xAxes: [{
                type: 'time',
                time: {
                  unit: 'month',
                  displayFormats: {
                    month: 'MMM YYYY'
                  }
                }
              }
            ],
            yAxes: [
              {
                ticks: {
                  // eslint-disable-next-line no-unused-vars
                  callback (value, index, values) {
                    return `${value}%`
                  }
                }
              }
            ]},
            legend: {
            display: true
          },
          responsive: true,
          aintainAspectRatio: false
        }
      }
    },
    created () {
      // eslint-disable-next-line no-unused-vars
      this.data = this.date.map((date, index) => ({
        x: new Date(date * 1000),
        y: this.challenge[index]
      }))
      let n=0
      
      this.data.forEach(i=>{
        this.dates[n]= i.x
        this.values[n]=i.y
        n+=1
      })
      console.log(this.dates)
      console.log(this.values)
    },
    mounted () {
      this.renderChart(this.datacollection, this.options)
    }
  }
</script>
